segments.text: I see the water overflowing, and I’m worried someone is going to slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware of the puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool, and it looks like it’s about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just watching, not realizing the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should turn around and see what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s reach for the cookies is making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems so innocent, not understanding the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman notices the water before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole situation feels like it’s about to spiral out of control.
segments.speaker: PAR
